name: Degraded Polymer Deposits
description: Degraded Polymer Deposits (Polyethylene, Polypropylene, PVC, Additives) is a common contamination pattern in laser cleaning. This organic-residue/polymer contamination affects surface integrity and requires specialized removal techniques. Commonly found on 22 different material types including metals, composites, and specialized substrates.
